Text: In recent years, an increasing number of employers began offering maternity, paternity and other parental leave, according to the Society for Human Resource Management. The percentage of companies offering paid maternity leave, for example, increased from 26 percent in 2016 to 35 percent in 2018.
Cause: In recent years, an increasing number of employers began offering maternity, paternity and other parental leave, according to the Society for Human Resource Management.
Effect: The percentage of companies offering paid maternity leave, for example, increased from 26 percent in 2016 to 35 percent in 2018.
Sentence: <e1>In recent years, an increasing number of employers began offering maternity, paternity and other parental leave, according to the Society for Human Resource Management.</e1> <e2>The percentage of companies offering paid maternity leave, for example, increased from 26 percent in 2016 to 35 percent in 2018.</e2>
